original_title: Leni Riefenstahl: Ein Traum von Afrika
overview: At the age of 97 Riefenstahl returns to Sudan for one final farewell to the Nuba that she lived with for 8 months and photographed and filmed extensively. MÃ¼ller documents her return after 23 years away and her reaction to the collapsing culture that she once celebrated so avidly in her photographs.
title: Leni Riefenstahl: Her Dream of Africa
